name: Super Dinosaur Shooting
description:
Enjoy the biggest new shooting and hunting Super Dinosaur Shooting. Become a deadly sharp shooter; enter to the dark forest to hunt or kill the huge dinosaurs with test your best sniper skills and show your real assassination experience

FEATURES:
Best sniper hunting experience in safari park.
Realistic first person shooting game.
Easy to play.
Stunning graphic.
3D game play and amazing sound effects
Hunting different dinosaurs.
With modern sniper shooting gun.
